trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ProfileEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato ProfileEventHandler è definito per l' <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento della <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_Personalize` global event, as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento del <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET utilizzando il `Profile_Personalize` eventi globali, come illustrato nell'esempio di questo argomento.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento per specificare un profilo utente personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter specified for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event's ProfileEventHandler is set to a non-null value when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use that value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>parametro specificato per il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>ProfileEventHandler dell'evento è impostato su un valore non null valore quando l' <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento di completamento, quindi <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>utilizza tale valore per la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>
